main_definition: When something is well planned or arranged, with various elements working together smoothly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having different parts work together in a harmonious way
meanings_and_examples.example: The choreography of the dance routine was perfectly coordinated.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Being skilled at managing various tasks or elements to achieve a desired outcome
meanings_and_examples.example: She is highly coordinated in her approach, efficiently juggling multiple projects at once.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of arranging items in an orderly and efficient manner
meanings_and_examples.example: We need to coordinate the different tasks so that they are completed on time.
